description: the available version here is 2.5, while the latest available version on the develepor's page is 2.6
Can't find the "Batch Image Manipulation..." inside the "File" menu after installing this plug-in, look for everywhere, look into the gimp plug-in folder, there's no plug-in at all.
Si se usan varios sistemas operativos, o varios escritorios en Linux, instalar complementos en todos es un engorro. Yo me he acostumbrado a hacerlo en BIMP y me olvido.
